raw_body: ABEYNAYAKE – MALLIKA. Beloved wife of late Nanda Abeynayake (formerly Commissioner – Rehabilitation Dept.),​ loving mother of Mahesa,​ Ianthie,​ Sharmini,​ Anil and Lilanthi,​ mother-in-law of Ananda,​ Athula,​ Tamiko and Mario,​ grandmother of Nilanka,​ Lasanka,​ Harshini,​ Sanjeeva,​ Anasha,​ Savanna,​ Limendra and Malindra,​ great grandmother of Cruz and Aiden,​ passed away peacefully in Melbourne. A memorial service to celebrate her life will be held at Fawkner Memorial,​ Melbourne,​ Australia on Friday,​ 8th December at 3:15 PM. All are welcome.080802
